name: io.github.dschuler36/reaper-mcp-server
description: A simple MCP server that connects a Reaper project to an MCP client like Claude Desktop and enables you to ask questions about the project.

tools.name: find_reaper_projects
tools.description: Finds all Reaper projects in the directory you specified in the config.

tools.name: parse_reaper_project
tools.description: Parses a Reaper project and returns a JSON object.
